title: Journey Orchestration Step Event Action Execution Fields
description: This Mixin will have Journey Action Metadata Fields.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionId
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Id of the action that is being executed.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Name of the action If no name has been set, the stepName will be taken.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionParameterized
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Indicates if the action is parameterized or not.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionTime
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The amount of time (in milliseconds) taken to execute a current action.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Type of error that happens when the action is called.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionErrorCode
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Code for action execution error. Present if the error has a code, such as an HTTP one.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionExecutionOriginError
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This Field tells about the timeout errors during retry for a Journey Action, such as HTTP,Capping.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionBusinessType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: What type of action it is. It could be ACS, Business  Action, SMS etc.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: deliveryJobId
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This describes the deliveryJobId for the batch Journey.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: batchDeliveryId
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This describes the deliveryId for the batch Journey.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: deliveryJobId
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: This describes if the Batch Journey triggered from Audisence Segment.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: actionSchedulerCount
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: count of scheduler notification requests sent to the scheduler service during the step processing.
